channel.title: Should The BattleScape Client Support Skulls For Pking Or For Prayer?
channel.description: For the new BatttleScape in development, which set of headicons should I use? Prayer icons for all the prayers of pk icons for if you attack a player first. What I did in blitz was used prayer icons and used the skull in the left corner of screen as a warning that your skulled, but what do you think?

item.title: Should The BattleScape Client Support Skulls For Pking Or For Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

santa pker:

y dont u make 2 clients 1 that has prayer icons 1 doesnt with same fetures

Although I could do that, and set a custom UID so that the server could determine which set of headicons to sue that way prayer wouldn’t display anything for the pk version, other people using the prayer version would make it so that they would have a skull above their head on your client even though really it’s prayer.

Read full topic
item.source: Should The BattleScape Client Support Skulls For Pking Or For Prayer?
